text:
Heet: This group is created to get data to fine tune our model to our talking style. Please talk a lot in this group, only in English, in your own style, and feel free to include some data about you.
  Heet: An example could be:
  Heet: Hi I am Heet Patel, I come from Surat, Gujarat
  Heet: Currently I am studying in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence branch of IIT Guwahati
  Heet: Personally, I feel the location of our college is nice, considering the fact that it sort of opens for us the option of exploring North East India more and more
  Heet: Feel free to share your opinions
  Heet: We currently have a lab called Python programming lab which is taught by Teena Ma’am who is our instructor for the particular course ‎<This message was edited>
  Heet: Hi guys
  Heet: what are you all doing?
  Heet: or should i ask, how are ya’ll doing?
  Heet: please keep this group active as we need a lot of chats in our very own styles to fine tune the model so we can show that it actually does copy our style
  Heet: and as fast as possible, we need to fill this group with a lot of texts
  Heet: damn
  Heet: thats a lot of work
  Heet: but
  Heet: we need to do it
  Heet: no other option
  Heet: this is the most laborious task ever, give me a break
  Heet: come on guys where are y’all, how’d you think we should proceed
  Heet: i mean, we could create A LOT of data and then use it with our model to make sense from it
  Heet: or else it won’t be worth it
  Heet: talk here
  Heet: A LOT
  Heet: hugeee
  Heet: LOTTT
  Heet: pleaseeee
  Prince: Hey there, I am Prince Tholia
  Prince: I am a 2nd year B.Tech student at IITG. Currently, I am pursuing the subject of data science and artificial intelligence.
  Prince: And yeah! I got the assigned task. I will try to text here every single minute.
  Prince: And yeah! I just woke up
  Prince: Pardon me
  Heet: oh damn
  Heet: niceee
  Heet: it's alright though, keep talking and everything is going to be fine

Onkar: Hello guys, I am onkar Shinde
 Prince: Yeah! Everything is going to be fine. This statement is just crap, bro. I almost wasted my semester with this. Nothing comes fine until we make it
  Prince: Hi onkar, how are you doing dude?
  Onkar: I am studying at IIT Guwahati in the 2nd year.
  Prince: I know I know
  Heet: true
  Heet: what to do
  Heet: no option there
  Onkar: Nice bro
  Heet: i mean, we are sort of stuck here in IIT in a boring monotonous day to day life
  Onkar: We have to do it together guys
  Heet: let's make a chatbot that breaks that barrier, amigos
  Prince: What, wasting the whole semester?
  Heet: let's conquer the world
  Heet: damn
  Prince: Yoooooooo!
  Prince: Let's do it
  Heet: haha
  Onkar: Not wasting semester bro. We have to do some productive work
  Onkar: Like we r making this model
  Prince: For that thing, I am in
  Heet: yessir
  Heet: all in for productive stuff
  Heet: and reproductive too for that matter 😂
  Prince: Anytime
  Prince: Anywhere
  Prince: +
  Prince: +
  Onkar: 😁😁
  Heet: damn 💀
  Heet: we are getting dataaaaa
  Heet: niceee
  Heet: once we reach about 500-600 texts, it'll be fine
  Heet: till then
  Heet: pour everything in here
  Onkar: Guys do u know the profits of going to Japan ?
  Heet: that was random
  Heet: but tell me
  Heet: Japan's a pretty country
  Heet: Heet loves asian
  Heet: also, I've got a dream of travelling the entire freaking world
  Heet: such high bars
  Onkar: Let the first place be Japan then!!
  Prince: I know what your dreams is🫣
  Onkar: RAG is one of  the major attractions
  Heet: and what we do is sit here at a useless place and do useless stuff, let's make this  chatbot a very useful thing 😎
  Prince: It looks like name of a fucking game bro
  Prince: So that we can print money with it 💰
  Prince: Let's make some fucking cash baby! 💸

Prince: Hey! In earlier days when I was a child I used to believe that data is famous name for a child in US and when I saw news that more and more is generated nowadays, I used to think that it's a metaphor that America's population is increasing.
 Heet: baapre 💀
  Heet: *damn
  Heet: well true though
  Heet: let's make some data
  Heet: suspicious activities
  Onkar: With drip
  Prince: I don't think that's a nice idea
  Prince: I wonder that some government agency is reading our chats
  Onkar: But which is what attracts me
  Prince: And although we are students they may suspect us as terrorist
  Onkar: Ohh but we don't have sahil in our group
  Heet: they'd be very confused bro
  Heet: confused out of their freaking minds
  Heet: damn Sahil's a terrorist?💀
  Onkar: No he is not
  Onkar: I'm just giving a reference 😀
  Heet: 👀
  Heet: suspicious activities
  Prince: Don't tell anyone, but I suspect him
  Prince: Why don't we focus on studies then?
  Prince: Huh,tell me
  Heet: also guys, let's also talk about our daily lives, what we could talk on a daily basis, so the suggestions would be based on that, could really increase our chances of relevant output
  Onkar: Guys I am on the bus going to the city
  Onkar: For party  🥳
  Prince: I wake up
 I eat 
 I go to classes
 I sleep
 I wake up
 I eat 
 I go to classes
 I sleep
 I wake up
 I eat 
 I go to classes
 I sleep
 I wake up
 I eat 
 I go to classes
 I sleep
 I wake up
 I eat 
 I go to classes
 I sleep
 I wake up
 I eat 
 I go to classes
 I sleep
 I wake up
 I eat 
 I go to classes
 I sleep
 I wake up
 I eat 
 I go to classes
 I sleep
 I wake up
 I eat 
 I go to classes
 I sleep
 I wake up
 I eat 
 I go to classes
 I sleep
  Onkar: Where r u guys ?
  Prince: I could be on my bed, with my girlfriend(I wish)
  Onkar: Dreams may come true
  Heet: haha
  Heet: everyone wishes
  Heet: damn what party??
  Heet: ill be on a bus for a party in about 2 hours
  Onkar: Tasveer afterparty
  Heet: ohhhh
  Heet: nicee

Heet: where are y'all going??
 Onkar: Don't know
  Onkar: It's secret 😔
  Onkar: But I'm too excited
  Heet: baapre
  Heet: makes sense
  Prince: 🤡
  Heet: fun bro fun
  Onkar: Yup 😛
  Heet: lessgoooo
  Onkar: Heet where r u going for party?
  Prince: I hope no one carrying a bomb 💣
  Prince: Heat goes to city every weekend
  Heet: we haven't decided yet, so it's a secret for our freshers too 💀
  Onkar: Nice
  Prince: Ah! Not this weekend
  Onkar: U know there is checking while entry of bus so that no one carries it inside campus 🙃
  Prince: Heet who else will be accompany you
  Prince: I am talking of girls
  Heet: udgam disrupt freshers
  Onkar: Prince will be happy if you invited him in the party
  Heet: you remember I was in this entrepreneurship summit called udgam?
  Heet: I worked in the disrupt module in it
  Prince: My boy my boy😘
  Onkar: What is udgam
  Onkar: ??
  Heet: so we're throwing a party for the people of disrupt
  Heet: especially the freshers
  Onkar: Okie
  Prince: Seniors, name them
  Onkar: That means u don't want to take prince with you.
  Heet: oh it is an entrepreneurship summit hostel by IIT Guwahati
  Prince: Oh boy,oh boy!
  Heet: it's quite big you know, i mean if you consider that after all it's just a big ass business meeting
  Heet: me, Mansi, shanu, Rahul
  Heet: all 2nd year
  Heet: also, onkar bro what's tasveer
  Onkar: Rahul Kumar from Kapili 👀
  Heet: i hope so
  Heet: but I'm not sure if he's coming or not
  Heet: I feel like he's pretty busy in his bihu situation
  Onkar: Tasveer is conducted every year by montage photography club of iitg.
  Prince: Do you need a substitute
  Onkar: In it photography exhibition
  Heet: I'll ask shanu and mansi
  Prince: Don't please
  Heet: but as a substitute, are you saying you're gonna pay for the freshers too?👀
  Prince: Before that you need to tell me the place where we all are up to
  Prince: 😂
  Heet: we were thinking swad
  Prince: Don't mess with me now

Heet: it's an all veg restaurant, somewhat like ghoomar, but here you get 15% discount
 Heet: cause they were our sponsors sometime
  Heet: ohhh
  Prince: Hehe
  Heet: what all do you display?
  Prince: So, I am in?
  Heet: should I ask them?
  Onkar: We display best photos of campus people and club members
  Onkar: And we give prices to b at 3 entries
  Onkar: Best*
  Heet: ohhh
  Heet: funn
  Heet: talk more guys
  Heet: keep them coming
  Heet: this is our world
  Heet: as perceived by AI
  Heet: goodnightt everyone
  Heet: even though it is morning
  Heet: it is night
  Prince: Yeah! It's bright but I can see darkness 😎
  Prince: I can't see anything that's why it's dark tho
  Heet: damn
  Heet: when did you go blind?
  Prince: Someone picked my eyes while I was high
  Heet: bro
  Prince: Chill out I got spider sense
  Heet: high as in the highest floor of research building?
  Prince: I did go there yesterday but there was free paneer muglai so I had to come back
  Heet: ohhh
  Heet: paneer mughlai rolls yumm
  Heet: very yumm
  Heet: i like
  Heet: ayo folks, keep the conversation goingg
  Heet: we gonna train that freaking AI tonight
  Prince: This is a tedious task
  Prince: Can't we just train it through the iit advisement park
  Heet: no English there bro
  Heet: sadly
  Prince: Ah! True
  Prince: When is the project submission
  Prince: Wait lemme check
  Prince: Everything is on 17th of April
  Prince: Which is Wednesday by the way
  Prince: By the way I just got a bath now
  Prince: And it's soothing
  Prince: OMG I feel so relaxed and cherished
  Heet: suspicious bhai
  Heet: very suspicious
  Heet: true
  Heet: let's hope we finish before that
  Heet: I'll try and train the model tonight
  Heet: one of you make the keyboard software if possible
  Prince: Sure, I am on it
  Prince: I will have my dinner first
  Prince: But I will talk to my parents beforehand
  Prince: After dinner I will read a book until 8 PM
  Heet: aight
